summary: Although free spirit Helen Bauer does not believe in marriage, she consents to marry Don, but his infidelities cause her to also take on a lover.
cast: Bette Davis|Gene Raymond|Frank McHugh|Monroe Owsley|Claire Dodd|Kay Strozzi|Ferdinand Gottschalk|Alphonse Ethier|Bodil Rosing|George Beranger|Edna Callahan|Maxine Cantway|Armand Kaliz|William H. O'Brien|Hedwiga Reicher|Gay Seabrook|Billy West|Renee Whitney|Ynez
title: Ex-Lady
